name: DEAD ETERNITY
description:
pilot the GYROSCOPE OF TIME, trapped in the dimension BEHIND SPACE as you fend off the SKULLS OF GRAVELAND:

- deploy your MOONSHIELD to defend yourself

- use the power of the DEAD GOD to fire magic missiles

- call on LORD HYPNOS to slow time itself 

- heal yourself with a DECEMBER FLOWER

there is no end to DEAD ETERNITY, only eventual death (and hopefully a high score!)

note: the embedded game is not mobile friendly. high scores will not persist after you close the tab, but will persist if you download the game. 

if the game does not work in your browser please try refreshing the page or click the link below to install Low Res NX (free) to play on your desktop, and download the cartridge by clicking the Download Here button.

music and themes inspired by IN FLAMES' seminal album and death metal masterpiece, THE JESTER RACE

this game uses Low Res NX and you may play it in your browser OR download the game to play in the fantasy console and even view/modify its source code!
